meanings.definition: A pouting expression or grimace typically made by pursing the lips.
meanings.sent1: She made a moue when she didn't get her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: Her moue showed her displeasure at the canceled picnic.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's moue at the broccoli was priceless.
meanings.sent4: His moue of disappointment was like a dark cloud over the room.
meanings.sent5: The actress's moue conveyed more than words ever could.

meanings.definition: To make a pouting expression or grimace.
meanings.sent1: He would moue whenever he was asked to do chores.
meanings.sent2: She moued in frustration at the long line in the store.
meanings.sent3: The comedian moued for laughs during his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: The student moued at the difficult math problem on the test.
meanings.sent5: The child moued playfully during the game of charades.
